channel.title: Portal & Menu Help
channel.description:
Okay, so when i rightclick a player it comes up like this.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/5eu0qc.png[/img]
I want to remove, where it says "Ban" to "Follow" and make following work. I also want to get rid of the green and white, and just make the names white. [hr] Okay, so i want to make a portal for a 317, allstar and i need help.
I have the portal id and the spot the portal is at i just need how to make the option selector and the teleports when you click the text it works.

item.title: Portal & Menu Help
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

Okay, so when i rightclick a player it comes up like this.

I want to remove, where it says “Ban” to “Follow” and make following work. I also want to get rid of the green and white, and just make the names white.
[hr]
Okay, so i want to make a portal for a 317, allstar and i need help.

I have the portal id and the spot the portal is at i just need how to make the option selector and the teleports when you click the text it works.
